title: Join Domain
description: Use this to join a Windows Domain

domainToJoin.description: fully qualified name of the domain to join

domainUsername.description: Username for user with credentials to join the domain

domainPassword.description: Password for user with credentials to join the domain

domainJoinOptions.description: Set of bit flags that define the join options. Default value of 3 is a combination of NETSETUP_JOIN_DOMAIN (0x00000001) & NETSETUP_ACCT_CREATE (0x00000002) i.e. will join the domain and create the account on the domain. For more information see https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aa392154(v=vs.85).aspx

ouPath.description: Specifies an organizational unit (OU) for the domain account. Enter the full distinguished name of the OU in quotation marks. Example: 'OU=testOU; DC=domain; DC=Domain; DC=com
